mapper.select:
SELECT e.id, e.full_name, e.credit_code, e.industry, e.tax_rating, e.region_code, e.annual_turnover, e.annual_tax_amount, e.existing_loan_balance, e.match_status, e.profile_data, e.created_at, e.updated_at FROM enterprises e JOIN user_enterprise_relation r ON e.id = r.enterprise_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY e.id DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM enterprises e JOIN user_enterprise_relation r ON e.id = r.enterprise_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO enterprises (full_name, credit_code, industry, tax_rating, region_code, annual_turnover, annual_tax_amount, existing_loan_balance, match_status, profile_data) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{creditCode}, #{industry}, #{taxRating}, #{regionCode}, #{annualTurnover}, #{annualTaxAmount}, #{existingLoanBalance}, #{matchStatus}, #{profileData})
mapper.update: UPDATE enterprises SET match_status = #{matchStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE enterprises SET profile_data = #{profileData} WHERE id = #{id}
